body_html: I think as it is we should close it. It seems like simply changing the dtypes in batchnorm to float16 is not the right solution to make it work well with float16, so it might require more thought.

body: I think as it is we should close it. It seems like simply changing the dtypes in batchnorm to float16 is not the right solution to make it work well with float16, so it might require more thought.
